Gabriopalpus Schillhammer, 2000a: 35
(species included:
ecitolycoides
).
TYPE SPECIES
:

Gabriopalpus ecitoycoides Schillhammer
, fixed by original designation and
monotypy.

ecitolycoides Schillhammer, 2000a: 37
(
Gabriopalpus
; Type locality: Cachemire: Sonamarg).
[337 species (1 doubtful); Neotropical, Nearctic, Palaearctic, Ethiopian,
Madagascan, Oriental, Australian, and Oceanic Regions]

Gabrius Stephens, 1829a: 23
(species included:
villosulus
,
semipunctatus
,
cinerascens
,
ventralis ,
attenuatus
,
nanus
,
pallipes
,
aterrimus
,
suaveolens
; [ Note: The same questions

and controversy concerning the authorship and date of publication for
Philonthus

apply to
Gabrius
. The issue is discussed in my “note” attached to the citation of the

original description for
Philonthus
]).
TYPE SPECIES
: Staphylinus aterrimus
Gravenhorst, fixed by subsequent designation by Westwood, 1838a: 16.
